title: April 18th - Basic Bitch Quickie (BBQ) Weekly Roundup
itunes:title: April 18th - Basic Bitch Quickie (BBQ) Weekly Roundup
itunes:subtitle: Britney Spears, A$AP Rocky Cheating Rumor, Kardashian Family Update, Coachella & Revolve Fest Update + More
description:
This week we're talking through a wide range of topics, from Britney's pregnancy announcement to discussing some of the disaster at Coachella and Revolve Fest this weekend. See below for the topics of the week:


Britney Spears Pregnant


ASAP Rocky & Rihanna Rumors

  • Designer Amina Muaddi Responds to Vile Cheating Rumor Regarding ASAP Rocky and Rihanna


Amber Heard & Johnny Depp

  • Amber Heard and Johnny Depp Defamation Case update


Divorce Galore

  • Ali Wong and Husband Justin Hakuta Divorce after 8 years of Marriage
  • Tish Cyrus files for divorce from Billy Ray Cyrus for third time


Kardashian Family Update

  • Kim & Khloe Kardashian accused of hogging the rides at Disneyland


Coachella Weekend 1 & Revolve Fest Update




Don't forget to follow us, review our podcast and subscribe on our socials!

  • Twitter: @BasicandBrain
  • Instagram: @TheBasicandTheBrain
  • TikTok: @thebasic_and_thebrain
  • Website: thebasicandthebrain.com



Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
